Sentencas: The reliable operation of solid oxide fuel cell stacks (SOFCs) depends strongly on the structural integrity of the sealing material.
Titulo: The effect of room temperature and high temperature exposure on the elastic modulus, hardness and fracture toughness of glass ceramic sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Indentation testing is used to determine the mechanical properties of glass-ceramic sealants typically used for solid oxide fuel cell stacks, in particular for the evaluation of elastic modulus, hardness and fracture toughness.
Titulo: The effect of room temperature and high temperature exposure on the elastic modulus, hardness and fracture toughness of glass ceramic sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Different sealing materials partly with reinforcement by metallic or ceramic filler (particles or short fibers) are tested.
Titulo: The effect of room temperature and high temperature exposure on the elastic modulus, hardness and fracture toughness of glass ceramic sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The materials are tested after the joining procedure and after additional annealing at operation temperatures to test the effect of further crystallization that might take place.
Titulo: The effect of room temperature and high temperature exposure on the elastic modulus, hardness and fracture toughness of glass ceramic sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Furthermore, the effect of environmentally enhanced slow crack growth at low temperatures in water saturated atmosphere is investigated.
Titulo: The effect of room temperature and high temperature exposure on the elastic modulus, hardness and fracture toughness of glass ceramic sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Finally, self-healing effects of the glass ceramic materials with and without pre-annealing at typical operation temperatures are considered.
Titulo: The effect of room temperature and high temperature exposure on the elastic modulus, hardness and fracture toughness of glass ceramic sealants for solid oxide fuel cells
